column5: Card Description
Fires multiple homing amulets.      Increases shots if button is held.
Generates a long-lasting border by  throwing amulets. Can block enemy   projectiles. Stuns the enemy if hit.
Instantly teleports and strikes at  the enemy. Form of attack changes   according to the button pressed.
A somersault kick attack. Wallslams and combos are possible but it      renders Reimu vulnerable to attack.
Fires multiple amulets straight     ahead. Rapid-firing with no homing  abilities. Good for offensive       measures.
Creates two borders around the      enemy. Restricts enemy movement to  the left/right or up/down. Strong   against moving targets but          disappears if Reimu moves.
Teleports and fires rapid needles ina wide arc. The button used         determines the firing direction.
Slides into an Ascension Kick. Hard to use as a counter\, but the slide  extends the reach\, so it's good as alinker or mixup.
Removes the homing from the Hakurei amulets to create a heavy barrage.  Since it takes a lot of amulets\,    it doesn't seem too efficient.
Places a border at her feet.        Renders an enemy that steps on it   defenseless. If you place more than one\, the old one will disappear\,    so be careful.
Creates a body double from amulets  to evade attacks. If the double     takes a hit\, it releases a barrage  of amulets. Best used at            close range.
Jumps into space and creates a      short-range barrier underneath her. There's a lot of variation in this  attack\, so use it to keep the       opponent off balance.
Fires homing spirit orbs. Since     there's enough to easily hit a      moving target\, it's easy to use in  a firefight.

One of the ultimate forms of the    Fantasy attacks. Suppresses the     enemy with a huge flood of homing   shots. There's almost no blind spot\,but its drawback is that it         consumes a large amount of energy.
Creates a barrier with Reimu at the center. It's pretty narrow but has avery strong counterattack. Even if  she jumps into the air\, the barrier remains for a while.
Creates an expansive barrier        centered around Reimu. It's         possible to counter since you're    invincible.
Forms damage-dealing boundaries on   the four corners of the stage\,      spreading slowly and evenly like a  wave.
Fires Yin-Yang orbs that bounce off the ground. They last a long time   and follow an unusual path\, so      their effectiveness depends on wherethey're fired from.
A close-range attack that fires a   circular field out from the palm of the hand.
A Yin-Yang orb made of immense      spiritual energy. Not only is it    useful as a direct attack\, but the  long-lasting after effect is        powerful\, too.
A string of Ascension Kicks.        It sets up quickly\, so there's lots of ways to use it in close combat.
Upon casting\, seven Yin-Yang orbs   appear. One lights every time you   hit the enemy; when all are lit\,    a large-scale attack envelops the   whole field.
